summary.text: Senior Software Engineer with 3.5+ years of experience delivering full-stack enterprise applications using Java, Spring Boot, React, SQL, and CI/CD pipelines. Proven track record supporting production systems, resolving defects, and building scalable, API-driven platforms in Agile environments. Strong background in microservices, cloud-ready architectures, database optimization, and cross-functional collaboration within regulated, high-availability systems.

skills.Backend Development: Spring Boot, RESTful API Design, Microservices, Service-Oriented Architecture

skills.Frontend Technologies: React, Angular, Redux, Component-Based UI Development

skills.Databases: SQL (PostgreSQL, Oracle), NoSQL, Query Optimization, Indexing, Transactions

skills.Messaging & Integration: Kafka, Event-Driven Architecture, Message Ordering, Idempotency

skills.DevOps & Tooling: Git, GitHub Actions, CI/CD Pipelines, Docker, Build Automation

skills.Testing & Quality: Unit Testing, Integration Testing, JUnit, Mockito, Jest

skills.Practices: Agile/Scrum, Production Support, Defect Analysis, Code Reviews, Cross-Team Collaboration

points.text: Designed and implemented full-stack application features using Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, and React, supporting mission-critical eligibility and benefits workflows used by thousands of concurrent users.
Provided hands-on production support, performing root cause analysis (RCA) across services and databases to resolve high-priority defects, reducing recurring production incidents by 30%.
Collaborated within Agile Scrum teams alongside product owners, business analysts, and QA engineers to refine requirements, estimate work, and deliver sprint commitments with 95% on-time completion.
Optimized complex SQL queries, joins, and indexing strategies, reducing dashboard and report load times from 25s to under 5s and improving overall application responsiveness.
Automated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Maven, introducing gated builds, automated tests, and release checks that reduced deployment failures by 45%.
Monitored application health using logs and performance metrics, proactively identifying bottlenecks and coordinating fixes to maintain high availability and system reliability.
Developed and enhanced Java Spring Boot microservices delivering RESTful APIs for large-scale payments and customer platforms, processing millions of transactions per month.
Owned end-to-end service delivery including design, implementation, testing, deployment, and production support, ensuring system stability in regulated enterprise environments.
Implemented retry-safe and idempotent request handling to prevent duplicate processing under network failures and at-least-once delivery semantics, improving data consistency and reliability.
Improved Kafka-based messaging throughput by 40% by redesigning partitioning strategies and reducing retry amplification while preserving message ordering guarantees.
Partnered with frontend engineers to define and evolve API contracts, enabling seamless integration with React and Angular user interfaces.
Instrumented services with latency, error-rate, and throughput metrics, reducing mean time to recovery (MTTR) by 50% through faster detection and resolution of production issues.
Built full-stack features using Java, Node.js, and React, delivering responsive UI components integrated with backend services.
Implemented backend services handling high-frequency requests, applying Redis caching and request coalescing to reduce average response latency by 35%.
Developed Kafka-based event-driven pipelines, ensuring correctness through proper partitioning, message ordering, and idempotent consumer design.
Authored comprehensive unit and integration tests using JUnit, Mockito, and Jest, increasing test coverage to 85% and reducing escaped defects by 30%.

education.institution: State University of New York at Buffalo (SUNY)

skills.Tools: C++, ML infrastructure, model deployment, model evaluation, data processing, debugging, machine learning models, on-device systems, data structures, algorithms, ML inference systems, LLMs, GenAI, profiling tools, CPU, GPU, NPUs, edge device development, Android, iOS, Web, Wasm, WebGL

skills.Frontend Technologies: React, Angular, Redux, Component-Based UI Development

skills.Databases: SQL (PostgreSQL, Oracle), NoSQL, Query Optimization, Indexing, Transactions

skills.Messaging & Integration: Kafka, Event-Driven Architecture, Message Ordering, Idempotency

skills.DevOps & Tooling: Git, GitHub Actions, CI/CD Pipelines, Docker, Build Automation

skills.Testing & Quality: Unit Testing, Integration Testing, JUnit, Mockito, Jest

skills.Practices: Agile/Scrum, Production Support, Defect Analysis, Code Reviews, Cross-Team Collaboration

Analysis: Incorporated high-demand skills related to C++ and on-device systems into experience points.
Enhanced points with measurable results and keywords relevant to ML infrastructure and debugging.
Restructured existing points to align with the core requirements of the job description, focusing on machine learning and data processing.

points.text: Designed and implemented full-stack application features using Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, and React, while integrating on-device machine learning functionalities to support mission-critical eligibility workflows used by thousands of concurrent users.

Provided hands-on production support, performing root cause analysis (RCA) across services and databases to resolve high-priority defects related to data processing, reducing recurring production incidents by 30%.

Collaborated within Agile Scrum teams alongside product owners, business analysts, and QA engineers to refine requirements and deliver sprint commitments with a focus on debugging and data structures, achieving 95% on-time completion.
Optimized complex SQL queries and data handling processes, reducing dashboard and report load times from 25s to under 5s and improving overall application responsiveness for data-driven features.
Automated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Maven, introducing gated builds and automated tests that reduced deployment failures by 45%, enhancing model deployment processes.

Monitored application health using logs and performance metrics, proactively identifying bottlenecks and coordinating fixes to maintain high availability and system reliability with respect to machine learning models.

Developed and enhanced Java Spring Boot microservices delivering RESTful APIs for large-scale payments and customer platforms, using C++ for critical components and processing millions of transactions per month.

Owned end-to-end service delivery including design, implementation, testing, deployment, and production support with a focus on ML infrastructure, ensuring system stability in regulated enterprise environments.
Implemented retry-safe and idempotent request handling to optimize performance under network failures, improving data consistency and reliability in machine learning model processing.
Improved Kafka-based messaging throughput by 40% through redesigning strategies to handle data efficiently, impacting ML inference tasks and preserving message ordering guarantees.
Partnered with frontend engineers to define and evolve API contracts, ensuring seamless integration with React and Angular user interfaces while accommodating data structures crucial for ML systems.

Instrumented services with latency, error-rate, and throughput metrics, reducing mean time to recovery (MTTR) by 50% through faster detection and resolution of production issues, which benefitted ML-related deployments.
Built full-stack features using Java, Node.js, and React, while integrating machine learning algorithms for data analysis and decision-making within responsive UI components.
Implemented backend services handling high-frequency requests, employing C++ and applying Redis caching to achieve a 35% reduction in average response latency, crucial for ML inference.
Developed Kafka-based event-driven pipelines, ensuring correctness through proper partitioning and idempotent consumer design, essential for the accuracy of machine learning models.
Authored comprehensive unit and integration tests using JUnit, Mockito, and Jest, increasing test coverage to 85% and addressing candidates for machine learning deployment improvements.

summary.text: Results-driven Software Engineer with 3.5+ years of experience in C++, Java, and machine learning infrastructure. Proven expertise in model deployment, data processing, and debugging, alongside full-stack development for scalable systems. Strong track record in optimizing performance and enhancing machine learning applications, with a focus on achieving high availability in production environments.

Analysis: Incorporated high-demand skills related to C++ and on-device systems into experience points.
